  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OutputPortTypeDescriptorActivity, Annotated<Activity<?>>, Configurable<com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode>, Activity<com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode>, AsynchronousActivity<com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode>, WorkflowItem

    public class XMLOutputSplitterActivity
extends AbstractAsynchronousActivity<com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode>
implements OutputPortTypeDescriptorActivity
    An activity that replicates the behaviour of the Taverna 1 XMLOutputSplitter.
    Author:
    Stuart Owen

      • getTypeDescriptorForOutputPort

        public TypeDescriptor getTypeDescriptorForOutputPort(String portName)
        Description copied from interface: OutputPortTypeDescriptorActivity
        Provides access to the TypeDescriptor for a given output port name.
        This TypeDescriptor represents the Type defined in the schema for this Activities WSDL.
        Specified by:
        getTypeDescriptorForOutputPort in interface OutputPortTypeDescriptorActivity
        Returns:
        the TypeDescriptor, or null if the portName is not recognised.
        See Also:
        TypeDescriptor, OutputPortTypeDescriptorActivity.getTypeDescriptorsForOutputPorts(), #getTypeDescriptorForInputPort(String)

      • getTypeDescriptorsForOutputPorts

        public Map<String,TypeDescriptor> getTypeDescriptorsForOutputPorts()
                                                            throws UnknownOperationException,
                                                                   IOException
        Return TypeDescriptor for a all output ports.

        This TypeDescriptor represents the Type defined in the schema for this Activities WSDL.

        Specified by:
        getTypeDescriptorsForOutputPorts in interface OutputPortTypeDescriptorActivity
        Returns:
        A Map from portname to TypeDescriptor
        Throws:
        UnknownOperationException - if the operation this Activity is associated with doesn't exist.
        IOException - If the WSDL or some of its dependencies could not be read
        See Also:
        TypeDescriptor, OutputPortTypeDescriptorActivity.getTypeDescriptorForOutputPort(String), #getTypeDescriptorsForInputPorts()
